name: Jewel Hexa 2.0
description:
* Ver. 2.0 Update *
- Added NEW play mode!
[Action Mode]: you can switch cross or lengthwise of the shape!
Enjoy this new feature as it can give more excitement and challenges!! ^ ^

Want to find the real treasure?
"The answer is in this puzzle"

Align three or more gems to gather magical items!

Survive until the end to collect the last relic!

Enjoy the colorful and shiny gems in this puzzle adventure!

Go and become the hero of this treasure!

* FEATURES *

- Keypad provides a variety of user-friendly interface
- Various effects of items as you advance through the levels
- Personal Ranking System + Online World Ranking System
- CLASSIC MODE: Single player mode
- ACTION MODE:(New UPADTE! / shape switching)

* How to enjoy even more fun Jewel Hexa?
- Discover hidden items as you go along. Unlock these items for double fun!
